item.title: Nasdaq Futures Lead Gains
item.description: Stock futures rose on strength in the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100.

item.title: Dollar Expected to Outperform in 2025
item.description: The DXY dollar index was weaker, however investors expected it to be the best-performing currency in 2025, according to Bank of America’s latest fund ...

item.title: Oil Edges Higher as Traders Weigh U.S. Tariff Risks
item.description: Crude futures returned to positive territory after opening the trading session lower as markets mull trade and tariff risks under Trump’s presidency.

item.title: Netflix Explodes Into a New Era
item.description: The streamer ends subscriber reporting with blowout numbers and a price hike, but its record market value sets a high bar going forward.

item.title: How a Trump Trade War Puts Cheap Oil From Canada at Risk
item.description: The cheap Canadian oil America craves is becoming a key bargaining chip in President Trump’s threatened trade war.
